channel.title: [PI] Highscores error
channel.description:
[code]src\server\model\players\Client.java:1055: cannot find symbol symbol : method saveHighScore() location: class server.util.SQL SQL.saveHighScore(); ^ Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 1 error Press any key to continue . . . [/code]
[size=12pt]Here is a link to the tutorial I followed http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,364364.0.html
Any Ways to resolve this problem?
Thanks[/size]

item.title: [PI] Highscores error
item.dc:creator: @Tobbescape Tobbescape
item.description:
@Tobbescape wrote:

If it is PI, there should be a fix for that in the tut

Project Insanity Information

Put SQL class in the util folder, in SQL class change saveHighScore(client clientToSave) to saveHighScore(Client clientToSave)

Project Insanity’s Server class doesn’t have a run method, so put SQL.createConnection(); in the main method
Code (Java): [Select]
public static void main(java.lang.String args[])
At the top of SQL class you import Client class
Code (Java): [Select]
import server.model.players.Client;And at the top of Client class and Server class import SQL class
Code (Java): [Select]
import server.util.SQL;
You also have to declare SQL’s package (In SQL class)
Code (Java): [Select]
package server.util;

Read full topic
